 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעַד‎</span>] **verb** ==step, march== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ascend***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽעֲדָה‎</span> [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]]: (but on text see below); 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽעֲדוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.6.13|2Sam 6:13]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְעָ֑ד‎</span> [[Prov.7.8|Prov 7:8]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצַעַדְךָ‎</span> [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצַעְדְּךָ‎</span> [[Ps.68.8|Ps 68:8]] ***step, march***, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]]; [[Ps.68.8|Ps 68:8]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location), [[Hab.3.12|Hab 3:12]] (with accusative<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span>); read probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעֵד‎</span> [[Hab.63.1|Hab 63:1]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעֶה‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צעה‎</span>); of men, with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְעָדִים‎</span> [[2Sam.6.13|2Sam 6:13]] ***they had gone six steps***; with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> ***step*** a certain way [[Prov.7.8|Prov 7:8]] of idols, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִצְעָ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Jer.10.5|Jer 10:5]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּנוֺת צָֽעֲדָה עֲלישֿׁוּר‎</span> [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] is dubious: usually (its) daughters (twigs of bough) ***have climbed*** over the wall (on singular verb see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:145k»§ 145k</sup>; others think <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָ֯‎</span>, old feminine plural ending, e.g. [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxiii (1884), 411</sup> JPPeters<sup>Hebraica iii (1887), 111; v (1888), 199</sup>; conjectured emendation of text see in Ball<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Holz|Holz]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתַצְעִדֵהוּ‎</span> [[Job.18.14|Job 18:14]] ***and it*** (an unseen Power [[BDB#Di|Di]]; disease [[BDB#Du|Du]], reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיַצ‎</span>) ***makes him march***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person
